/*
    Justin Ryan L. Ayubo
    1st Year - BS Information Technology
    Ateneo de Naga University
    Practice(Peer)
    Problem Code: CHFMAX
                                         */
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T=0;
    string S;
    
    cin >> T;
    
    while(T--)
    {
     S="";
     int alpha[26] = {0};
     cin >> S;
     int len = S.length();
     for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
      alpha[(int)S[i]-'a']++;
     
     int det = alpha[0];
     int ind = 0;
     
     for(int i=1;i<26;i++)
     {
      if(alpha[i] > det)
      {
       ind = i;
       det = alpha[i];
       }
      }
     
     for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
      if(S[i] == ((char)(ind+'a')))
       cout << "?";
      else
       cout << S[i];
     
     cout << endl;
     }
     
     return 0;
     }
